column4: I need help getting ubuntu 7 10 to run at 1280 x800 resolution inside of virtual box, and the person there basically told me to RTFM which I actually tried and got me nowhere. Can someone please help
I tried doing an dpkg-reconfigure which has worked in every other system I have used but now I have a messed up x session that is unusable
yeah, thats pretty normal on gutsy.  i cant get dpkg-reconfigure to work either
